messages.content: Pines Cabin, 2011?  What a job they have assigned ole Mr. Wiff -- to track down everyone's contact details.  We are doing a mass postal mailing of the latest issue of the "Kingswood For Life" alumni newsletter.  Please verify your current postal mailing address so that we can mail you a copy. It is packed full of baloney from the good old days and you will be thoroughly amused.  How about your email, too, while you are at it?
